metadata.title: CVE-2024-36032 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: qca: fix info leak when fetching fw build idAdd the missing sanity checks and move the 255-byte build-id buffer offthe stack to avoid leaking stack data through debugfs in case thebuild-info reply is malformed.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
